item.title: /sreevardhan
item.description: My Name is Sreevardhan, I am a Full Stack Developer I build apps using Django, Node.js, Flask and React. I am currently learning Docker, Kubernetes and Golang I am building apps since 2018 Some quotes that had profound effect on me “Premature optimization is the root of all evil” - Donald Knuth “Make it work, make it right, make it fast” â€“ Kent Beck “Code without tests is broken by design” - Jacob Kaplan-Moss Socials Stack Overflow Linkedin Github
